mapper.insert: insert into menu (menu_num, menu_name, menu_price, menu_introduction, menu_origin, menu_kind, menu_image, menu_store_image, store_num) values (#{menuNum}, #{menuName}, #{menuPrice}, #{menuIntroduction}, #{menuOrigin}, #{menuKind}, #{menuImage}, #{menuStoreImage}, #{storeNum})
mapper.select: select menu_num, menu_name, menu_price, menu_kind, menu_introduction, menu_image, menu_store_image, menu_origin, store_num from menu where store_num = #{store_num}
